name: Candle: The Short and Fateful Life of a Light
name_original: Candle: The Short and Fateful Life of a Light
description:
Two people, one light.

Will they make it out of the mansion?

With a simple yet addictive gameplay, this story takes place inside a large and somber mansion where you are alone and lit only by the small candle you carry. Watch out for great falls and treacherous dead ends.

The light will fade, and you along with it.
